text: geuleoni man-yag geudeul-i geudaedeul-ui mid-eumgwa dong-ilhan geos-eul midneundamyeon sillo geudeul-eun indoui gil-eul geodneun geos-ila. geuleona man-yag geudeul-i dol-aseondamyeon geudeul-eun ojig galdeung sog-e iss-eul ppun-ila. hananimkkeseo geudeullobuteo geudaeleul jikyeojusil geos-ila. geubunkkeseoneun modeun geos-eul deul-eusigo modeun geos-eul algo gyesineun bun-ila
